Text:
Don't forget it also works with widescreen.
I love this game and point to it when I find a new game that doesn't support widescreen or Win7x64 while arguing.

And thanks for the music, I could never get it to work with the no-cd patch.

getting used to holding Shift and X at the right times to line build lots of stuff is important.
scrolling while line building changes the spacing of the line.
Sorry for the slow initial seeding, if someone could please direct their client at a previously downloaded copy of my other TA torrent, we can get more seeds up way faster.

This is a great torrent you don't even have to install anything. Thanks for uploading. 

I'll be seeding this.
I'll be seeding on this game! :) Hope it'll help ^^
